scripts.dist: yarn app dist && yarn svc dist && ls -l dist
scripts.serve: concurrently -n svc,app --kill-others-on-fail "yarn svc serve" "yarn app serve"
scripts.clean: rm -rf app/dist dist libs/*/dist libs/*/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo svc/dist yarn-error.log */yarn-error.log libs/*/yarn-error.log
scripts.nuke: yarn clean && rm -rf app/node_modules libs/*/node_modules node_modules svc/node_modules
